title: Episode 21: Michael Talks Uncertainty and Commitment
description:
This episode I have a conversation with Michael, who shares a bit about his deconstruction journey. We discuss what it means to commit to beliefs in the face of being uncertain and how to process those doubts without being negatively impacted by emotions.  The conversation was never meant to be released publicly, but I'm super grateful Michael allowed me to pull this out of the vault. It was a wonderfully candid conversations and I really hope you enjoy our chat! 

Michaels Convo W/ Paul: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BDXUhMfbXXM&t=1s
